verses.text: \w With|strong="H1732"\w* all \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart I will praise \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, all \w your|strong="H1732"\w* wonders I will rehearse.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H3068"\w* exult \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, singing \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w Most|strong="H3068"\w* \w High|strong="H6381"\w*;
because backward \w my|strong="H8034"\w* foes \w were|strong="H8034"\w* turned, \w they|strong="H8034"\w* stumbled \w and|strong="H8034"\w* perished before \w you|strong="H2167"\w*.

\w My|strong="H7725"\w* right \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* claim \w you|strong="H6440"\w* have upheld, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* did sit \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* throne \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fair judge,

rebuking \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations, destroying \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* blotting \w their|strong="H3588"\w* name \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w forever|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H8034"\w* foe \w is|strong="H8034"\w* vanished, ruined \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w their|strong="H4229"\w* cities \w destroyed|strong="H4229"\w*, \w their|strong="H4229"\w* \w memory|strong="H8034"\w* perished.

See! \w The|strong="H5892"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* seated \w forever|strong="H5331"\w* \w on|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* throne \w he|strong="H5892"\w* established \w for|strong="H5892"\w* judgment,

\w ruling|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w world|strong="H5769"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* judging \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w with|strong="H3068"\w* equity.

\w So|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \nd Lord\nd* proves \w a|strong="H3068"\w* haven to \w the|strong="H8199"\w* oppressed, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* haven \w in|strong="H8398"\w* times \w of|strong="H8199"\w* trouble.

Well \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w you|strong="H6256"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* know \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w you|strong="H6256"\w*, \w you|strong="H6256"\w* never abandon.

Sing \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* \w home|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Zion, \w declare|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* deeds \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* avenger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* blood, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* keeps \w them|strong="H5046"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* mind, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5971"\w* forget \w the|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wretched.

Show \w me|strong="H7911"\w* favor, \nd Lord\nd*, see \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* foes afflict \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, lift \w me|strong="H7911"\w* up \w from|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gates \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w death|strong="H1818"\w*;

\w so|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* help exulting, \w tell|strong="H7200"\w* forth \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H7311"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zion.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* nations \w are|strong="H6726"\w* sunk \w in|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pit \w which|strong="H5608"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w*, \w in|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* net \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* hid, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* own foot \w is|strong="H3605"\w* entangled.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w is|strong="H6213"\w* revealed \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1471"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* snared \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* own handiwork. \qs Selah\qs*

Let \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* depart \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol, \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* nations \w that|strong="H3045"\w* live forgetful \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* needy \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w always|strong="H3605"\w* forgotten, nor \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* helpless \w be|strong="H1471"\w* lost \w forever|strong="H3605"\w*.

Arise, \nd Lord\nd*; donâ€™t \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w* triumph: \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* face \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w be|strong="H3808"\w* judged.

Strike \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w*, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w show|strong="H5810"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* how frail \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*
